bibl.title: Aspects of the Structure of Callimachus' Aetia.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The grouping of aitia in Aetia 1. fr. 1-25. - 3. The structure of the first part of the Aetia and the Argonautica. - 4. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: HARDER Annette, Aspects of the Structure of Callimachus' Aetia.
M.A. HARDER, R.F. REGTUIT and G.C. WAKKER (Edd.), Callimachus = Hellenistica Groningana. 1 (Groningen, 1993) pp. 99-110.
1. Introduction. - 2. The grouping of aitia in Aetia 1. fr. 1-25. - 3. The structure of the first part of the Aetia and the Argonautica. - 4. Conclusion.
